price: Nígbà tí àṣẹ Wa dé, A sọ òkè ìlú wọn di ìsàlẹ̀ rẹ̀ (ìlú wọ́n sì dojú bolẹ̀). A tún rọ òjò òkúta amọ̀ sísun lé wọn lórí ní tẹ̀léǹtẹ̀lé.
arabic: فَلَمَّا جَآءَ أَمۡرُنَا جَعَلۡنَا عَٰلِيَهَا سَافِلَهَا وَأَمۡطَرۡنَا عَلَيۡهَا حِجَارَةٗ مِّن سِجِّيلٖ مَّنضُودٖ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: falammā jāa amrunā jaʿalnā ʿāliyahā sāfilahā wa-amṭarnā ʿalayhā ḥijāratan min sijjīlin manḍūdin
